definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
phablet (hybrid between a smart phone and a tablet)
tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]

sentences.english: For flat glass, heat tempering is most often used.
sentences.chinese: 對於平板玻璃，熱退火是最常用的。

sentences.english: Tablets are newer and just beginning to pervade the market.
sentences.chinese: 平板電腦較新且剛剛開始蔓延於市場。

sentences.english: Usefull to upgrade or recover your tablet.
sentences.chinese: 用於升級或恢復您的平板。

sentences.english: The growth of HNE-1 cells was examined by MTT test and clone formation test.
sentences.chinese: 採用MTT法及平板集落形成實驗評價細胞增殖活性。

sentences.english: Using dilution-plate method, the inhibiting effect to the bacteria of the vanillin was determined.
sentences.chinese: 用稀釋平板法測定了香蘭素對細菌的抑制作用。

sentences.english: If you have a flat-panel display ignore this tip.
sentences.chinese: 如果您有一個平板顯示忽略這個要訣。

sentences.english: This is the biggest difference between the four tablets.
sentences.chinese: 四款平板電腦上，最大的不同就在這裏。

sentences.english: The same can be said for the fabled Microsoft slate products.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的情況也可以發生在傳聞中的微軟的平板產品。

sentences.english: The development of vibration plates has been highly eventful.
sentences.chinese: 振動式平板夯的發展已得到了高度的重視。

sentences.english: We have constructed suitable screening method for low-temperature sensitive promoters.
sentences.chinese: 建立了簡便的雙層平板誘導法對啓動子進行初篩。

sentences.english: I’d love to give out tablets, but I only have so much capital budget.
sentences.chinese: 我很想開發平板電腦，但是我只有這麼多資金預算。

sentences.english: Rice cooker is made of metal plate with mold and pressed into such a shape.
sentences.chinese: 蒸飯鍋也是由金屬平板用模具壓成這樣的形狀。

sentences.english: The tablet is claimed to have been verified through talk with an Asian component supplier.
sentences.chinese: 該平板機需要與一家亞洲的部件商交談後確定。

sentences.english: To clarify the weight to load and the flatbed's rated load; it can not be overloaded.
sentences.chinese: 要弄清所載物的重量和平板車的額定負荷，不能超載。

sentences.english: 'We need to be in the tablet business, ' Ms. Whitman added.
sentences.chinese: 惠特曼補充說，我們需要進軍平板電腦業務。

sentences.english: The accuracy of flat plate, turbulent skin friction at supersonic speeds.
sentences.chinese: 超音速速度下平板，湍流蒙皮摩擦的精確度。

definition: tablet computer (iPad, Android devices etc)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
phablet (hybrid between a smart phone and a tablet)
